channel.title: Machine-Learning on William Collins
channel.description: Recent content in Machine-Learning on William Collins

item.title: Are You Building AI Or Just Using It
item.description: As AI dominates tech headlines and corporate strategies in 2024, an important distinction is being blurred - the difference between developing AI versus consuming AI services. This mischaracterization risks confusing the market and overselling capabilities, but that isn’t anything new right? Take zero-trust, cloud computing, or even take a look back at the early-2000s with the web revolution. Urs Baumann tossed out a great questions in the Network Automation Forum - Slack recently, and I thought it would make for a good blog (or maybe venting session depending on how you look at it). Remember, these are opinions.
